amendment.description: To provide support for democracy in Iran.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1145 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1145 proposed by Senator Brownback to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9105-9107; text: CR S9105) To provide support for democracy in Iran.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1145 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
